price: ߊ߲ ߞߍߕߐ߫ ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߔߊߦߌߔߊߦߌ ߦߋ߫ ߟߏ߲ ߡߍ߲ ߒ ߞߏ߫ ߌ ߓߘߊ߫ ߝߊ߫ ߓߊ߬ ߸ ߊ߬ ߘߴߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߦߊ߯ߟߊ߫ ߡߞߊ߬ߝߏ߬ߝߋ߲߫ ߓߴߦߋ߲߬ ߓߊ߬؟
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمۡتَلَأۡتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلۡ مِن مَّزِيدٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yawma naqūlu lijahannama hali im'talati wataqūlu hal min mazīdin
